subject: Usin swingui
msgSnippet: Hi, Is there somebody who explain me how to use suite with the swingui oj JUnit. I tryed this : TestSuite suite= new TestSuite( TestHelloWorld );
messageBody:
Hi,

Is there somebody who explain me how to use 'suite' with the swingui oj
JUnit. I tryed this :
TestSuite suite= new TestSuite("TestHelloWorld");

suite.addTest(new TestHelloWorld("testSayHello"));
suite.addTest(new TestHelloWorld("testSayHello2"));
suite.addTest(new TestHelloWorld("testSayHello3"));

junit.swingui.TestRunner junitSwing = new
junit.swingui.TestRunner();
junitSwing.setSuite("TestHelloWorld");
junitSwing.runSuite();


this don'work...


Thank for your help...
